thread.title: Scarlett Moffatt bags new prime-time TV job after triumphant debut on Saturday Night Takeaway
thread.title_full: Scarlett Moffatt bags new prime-time TV job after triumphant debut on Saturday Night Takeaway

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Scarlett Moffatt bags new prime-time TV job after triumphant debut on Saturday Night Takeaway
text:
Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Scarlett Moffatt became a brand new addition to Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway last weekend. 
And now it seems the former Gogglebox star impressed TV bosses so much she's bagged herself a new job. 
The I'm A Celebrity winner has reportedly secretly filmed a new pilot for Channel 4. 
The Comedy Project could air later this year on Friday nights. Scarlett Moffatt is getting plenty of job offers (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
“ Scarlett is now in huge demand from the TV industry," a source told The Sun . 
“Channel 4 feel they created her through Gogglebox and don’t want to lose her to ITV. 
“She was the first celebrity who they approached to do the pilot for The Comedy Project, which is likely to become a big show for them.” 
Mirror Online have contacted Scarlett's representative for comment. Scarlett with her Saturday Night Takeaway co-stars (Photo: Instagram/scarlett_moffatt) 
On Saturday nights, Scarlett is taking over from Ashley Roberts on Saturday Night Takeaway but this week she left the presenting duo and viewers in absolute hysterics as she went to find a viewer to ride in a helicopter with her. 
She was seen running around the streets trying to find an Ant and Dec fans waving at their window to sit in the ‘best seats in the house’. 
But Scarlett couldn't find anyone following the instructions! 
She finally found someone, but Ant McPartlin was left unimpressed with her choice. Read More Scarlett revealed the ITV viewers don't watch adverts (Photo: ITV) Scarlett probably shouldn't have said that! (Photo: ITV) Ant couldn't believe it! (Photo: ITV) 
When the former Gogglebox star entered the studio with him and his wife, she explained why he hadn't been at his window waving.
